name: Potion Panic! Virtual Pinball
description:
Made for the GodotWildJam #46

Theme: ORB

A witch themed pinball game where you can use magic to fling the orb. Once a potion is chosen in the middle screen ingredients will spawn around the map. The main orb will be able to collect these ingredients for the potion. 

Multiball Potion:

Spawns 2 more empty orbs onto the map. They don't contain any mana like the main orb and can't collect ingredients, but still help rack up points! Plus if the main orb perishes then it will take over an empty orb instead of losing a life!

Mana Potion:

Increases Mana regeneration and the cooldown on the magic launch ability!

Flight Potion:

Sides and Middle drops now push the ball up and out keeping you safer from losing a Orb

Jackpot Potion:

Cashes out build up jackpot points! Every time you earn points some points are put to the side for the jackpot. You can multiply this amount with the Pumpkin Rollover switches for major points!

Try and aim for the best score and earn a spot on the leaderboard! 

(Leaderboard by SilentWolf)
